description: Episode of Series "History of the Motion Picture". This film spotlights the remarkable achievements of a quartet of great film pioneers, Edwin S.Porter, Georges Melies, Thomas H.Ince, and D.W.Griffith, who in a few years prior to 1914 brought imagination, drama, technical innovations and photographic trickery to the screen. Illustrated by excerpts from the films.
